tooltipTitle.slippageTolerance: Permitted margin of disparity between the current price of an asset and the final one after swap
tooltipTitle.routes: Path from one asset to another consisting of zero or more segments between pairs
tooltipTitle.minimumReceived: The lowest amount received after swap initiation
tooltipTitle.priceImpact: The effect on the price the given swap action incurs
tooltipTitle.liquidityProviderFee: A small sum paid to liquidity providers
tooltipTitle.APYBasis: Annual Percentage Yield accrued. Includes your interest rate and the frequency of compounding interest
tooltipTitle.totalLiquidity: Amount of liquidity currently available in the given pool
tooltipTitle.totalFee: A sum paid for creating a pool
tooltipTitle.lPFee: A sum paid for providing liquidity
tooltipTitle.protocolFee: A sum deducted from pool creation that accrues on platform
tooltipTitle.referralFee: A sum you get from referred user as reward
